contentBlocks.title: Physical Interpretation
contentBlocks.content: The KMS conditions for two times physically mean: Thermal equilibrium is defined jointly for (ttherm, tortho) Fluctuation-dissipation theorem holds in the extended 2T phase space Unitarity is preserved: No ghosts from extra time (Sp(2,R) gauge fixes this) Cosmological arrow emerges from Stherm growth, while Sortho remains bounded (compactified)

The most significant cosmological prediction of the Principia Metaphysica framework is the existence of a late-time de Sitter attractor driven by the Mashiach field. This provides a dynamical explanation for the observed cosmic acceleration.

contentBlocks.content: In modified gravity, the QFC must be reformulated to account for the additional scalar degrees of freedom. The Principia Metaphysica framework satisfies the generalized QFC provided the Mashiach potential satisfies V'' > 0 (convexity).
